title: A new one….
detail_text: <:th_ch0204/>Kanan-chan, your hell triathlon was really tough….<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0103/>Hehe~, if it were easy to do, it wouldn’t count as training. It’s better if you feel that sense of “I did it!” right?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0204/>Well, that’s true. But….<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0103/>But?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0204/>I think there’s still something missing from it….<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0103/>Something missing….?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0204/>It’s core training! We need to have strong cores for intense dance moves, right? We can do planks easily, or even something like a balance ball is good<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0103/>Hmm…. A triathlon is a single event, so it might be hard to add more things to it. And if we add more to that plan, I don’t know if it’s even doable anymore…. But, if we make a hell series 2 instead, I think we can do it!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0204/>“Hell series 2”?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0103/>Let’s use your expertise to make a new training plan, Karin-chan! We have to contact Umi-chan immediately!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
